reviews.reviewText: the auto refill option for hearing aids is great! price is best I can find & they last a week.

reviews.name: Rayovac Size 312 Mercury-Free Hearing Aid Batteries,  12-Pack
reviews.reviewText: I have had my hearing aids only 5 weeks, and still learning. I noticed your wed site on the initial package of batteries I received. I went on line, found a great deal! This shipping time was excellent.
reviews.title: New to this

reviews.name: Rayovac Size 312 Mercury-Free Hearing Aid Batteries,  12-Pack
reviews.reviewText: The batteries I purchased for my hearing aides are the same ones I have used and ordered in the past. They work well, the company responds well and they are shipped in a timely fashion. I would recommend these to other consumers.
reviews.title: Review of Rayovac hearing aide batteries

reviews.name: Rayovac Size 312 Mercury-Free Hearing Aid Batteries,  12-Pack
reviews.reviewText: never been disappointed in the service and quality. best deal around!! this should be advertise more to the public - I found out about this through my co-worker whose husband works for rayovac
reviews.title: BEST DEAL AROUND

reviews.name: Rayovac Size 312 Mercury-Free Hearing Aid Batteries,  12-Pack
reviews.reviewText: It is easy to order and receive these batteries. They work as well as any I have ever bought
